seo.title: SEO Copywriting & Content for Small Businesses | Metis Web Agency
seo.description: We write website and landing page copy that ranks and converts: keyword intent mapping, page structure, conversion-focused copy, and SEO content built for modern search (and AI answers).

content.title: Copy that helps you get found — and get chosen
content.subtitle: Copy isn’t filler. It’s what turns your service into a decision.
content.body: We write pages and content with one clear goal: make people understand who you are, what you do, and why you’re the right choice—fast. With SEO and structure so Google (and AI) can surface you. With proof and CTAs so people contact you.

content.title:
The problem isn’t having pages.
It’s having pages that say little and don’t guide.
content.subtitle: SEO without copy doesn’t convert. Copy without SEO doesn’t get seen.
content.body: We start from search intent and translate it into structure, headings, sections and CTAs. Every page has a job: capture demand, explain clearly, reduce doubts, and drive one action.

columns.title: Keyword + intent map
columns.subtitle: What people actually search
columns.description: We map queries, intent and competition so you don’t write “by gut feeling”—you write to be found.

columns.title: Structure & hierarchy
columns.subtitle: H1/H2, sections, CTAs
columns.description: We organize information to be understood in 10 seconds and remembered for the right reasons.

columns.title: AI-search ready content
columns.subtitle: Clear, quotable answers
columns.description: Definitions, FAQs, useful details and clean writing increase your chances of appearing in generated answers.

media.alt: SEO copywriting and content | Metis Web Agency

content.title: Writing = strategy + structure + tone
content.subtitle: Your voice must be coherent, not just “nice”.
content.body: We define positioning and tone of voice, then write for outcomes: service pages, landing pages, FAQs and blog content. When needed, we also support technical SEO basics (metadata, internal linking, URL structure) to maximize impact.

header.title: Concrete deliverables — not “creative words”
header.subtitle: Every text must have a function.
header.body: We choose what you actually need based on your industry and the stage you’re in.

items.title: Service page copy
items.description: Headlines, sections and CTAs that clearly explain what you do, for whom, and why you’re different—built for SMEs and professionals.

items.title: Landing + Ads copy
items.description: Messaging aligned with your offer and your ads: higher conversion rate and lower cost per lead.

items.title: Content refresh (existing pages)
items.description: We cut the fluff, rewrite what confuses, improve CTAs and internal links—without rebuilding everything from scratch.

items.title: Editorial plan + SEO articles
items.description: Topics that match real queries and build authority, with priorities and a sustainable calendar.

items.title: FAQs + “quotable” answers
items.description: Frequently asked questions, definitions and clear explanations—useful for people and AI search engines.

items.title: Microcopy (forms, buttons, errors)
items.description: Small words, big impact: reduce friction and increase form submissions and enquiries.
